body.name: PurrJoys Full Mattress, 10 Inch Memory Foam Full Size Mattress, Full Bed Mattress in a Box Pressure Relief & Firm Mattress,Mattress Full Size…
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: 【Enhanced Comfort & Support】- Experience a truly luxurious sleeping surface with our premium full mattress. The high-end knit fabric provides exceptional comfort and breathability, ensuring a cozy and relaxing night's sleep. The self-contained pocket spring system is designed to alleviate stress on the body and deliver balanced support. Each pocketed spring works independently, minimizing any disturbance caused by the movement of your sleeping partner or pets.

【Optimal Softness & Support】- Our full hybrid mattress combines the best of both worlds by incorporating the traditional support of an innerspring mattress with the plush comfort of memory foam. The dual foam layers are meticulously designed to offer the perfect blend of softness and support. Experience the ultimate cushioning and enjoy relief from painful pressure points on your body. This top-quality mattress is particularly beneficial for individuals suffering from back and neck pains.

【Individually Encased Pocket Springs】- Our mattress features a state-of-the-art pocket spring system that offers excellent orthopedic support. The individual encased coils ensure even pressure distribution for your head, shoulders, waist, hips, and legs. With our mattress, you'll receive customized support precisely where you need it. The individually-wrapped pocket springs work independently, closely following your body contours for maximum comfort and restful sleep.

【Convenient Delivery & Setup】- We've made it easy for you to receive and set up your new mattress. The 10-inch (26cm) memory foam full bed mattress is compressed, vacuum-sealed, and neatly rolled up in a box, ensuring efficient delivery. It fits all types of frames, including box springs, floors, slatted bases, flat platforms, and hospital beds. Unpacking is a breeze, as the mattress restores to its original shape within 10 seconds. It fully expands in 72 hours, ready for you to enjoy.

【Warranty & Satisfaction Guaranteed】- We are confident in the quality and durability of our mattress. That's why we offer PurrJoys's 100-night trial and a 10-year warranty. Customer satisfaction is our priority, and we provide comprehensive customer service to address any inquiries or concerns you may have. Experience the difference with PurrJoys and start enjoying a rejuvenating sleep experience. Welcome to inquire and discover more about our exceptional products and services.
body.description: 【PurrJoys Double Bed Mattress 】Use perfect 3D knitted fabric to make the surface comfortable and breathable. The 1.4-inch high-density mixed foam layer under the seam top layer helps minimize pressure points. The wound 6.5-inch pocket coil moves independently, reducing the sense of movement and providing interference-free relaxation. 【10-inch Full Size Mattress】: 54 x 75 inch with high-density mixed foam and medium-hardness temperature neutral, sports isolation. This is a high-quality double mattress with a fire-resistant polyester barrier with flammability standards to help you spend a good night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mattress is very good quality, easy to move around when delivered and easy to put in place on bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super great for the money, very comfortable, I unwrapped it from the box and was no long waiting period for use. Perfect firmness, will purchase another soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lot of mixed reviews on here but here's my two cents. It's nice. It's comfortable, the edges are decently stiff. And it's cheap. Not sure if it's from sleeping on an air mattress for months, but this bed feels amazing in comparison

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad at all
reviews.reviewText: Pretty comfortable and material quality seems pretty good so far. Had it about a week and sleep has been better and wake up with much less back pain. I did buy the Firm one but it's not firm, though it's still comfortable enough that I didn't return it. For the price, it is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: This product surprised me. When it arrived, it came in a small box and I thought they had the wrong item when I took it out the box and it blew up like a mattress when I tell you this thing feels amazing.. trust me I will purchase one again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Sink in the middle and I am 130lbs.
reviews.reviewText: Soft, Sink in the middle and I am 130lbs. Small. Very uncomfortable. This is NOT a medium-firm mattress. It is the softest I have ever seen, You literally sink into it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product Worth the $$$$
reviews.reviewText: Very good bed, I love my new bed a lot. It’s very comfort, I sleep so good on my new bed that I don’t wanna get out of my bed. Everyone may have good experience with this bed, everyone’s situation is different. My back doesn’t be in pain, but most times I would turned my mattres around, I brought a box spring and frame at the store, and the guy had put up the mattress and put the cover on it to protect from bed bugs coming, the shipping was very fast to, it was so fast because I had it to have two people put the mattress on my new box spring. It’s a bit thickness Around the sides, the appearance is well put together, some times it sinks but not all the time. My sis loves how my bed feels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This mattress suffices very well for my guest bedroom. There are a couple of puffs ups on the mattress too but it doesn't seem to make a big deal in comfort.

Purchased this one sale for under $250 , expectations were not high. This was bought for my sons room. My whole family is now jealous lol this is such a comfortable mattress it was so easy to unpack the best $$ spent ! Couldn’t be any happier !
Purchased for spare room. I did lay on it for 1/2 hour and did find it comfortable. I am plus size so I did find that when I sat on it the mattress flattened.

We love this mattress- it is firm enough yet very comfortable.I often have a sore back that is aggravated by mattresses, and this is the right amount of firmness and comfort.We bought this for a guest room but I have tried this out and it’s great!It decompressed quickly and efficiently.I would definitely buy this again.

I’ve been sleeping on an air mattress since August, first bed I’ve ever bought for myself and I absolutely love it. Super soft so I didn’t even need my foam mattress topper. It even comes with a mattress protector! Can’t wait to see how the cooling part works in the summer time!
